https://github.com/ksoichiro/Android-ObservableScrollView //Help Dialog To exit the app you can just double click back in the browser. If you want, you can enable offline support in the settings. Websites will then be saved in the cache.

The lists:
Every list has a context menu, which you can reach by long pressing an item. The readLater and history lists can be cleared with one click.

• Bookmark: as always - save your favorite websites for a faster access.
• readLater: here you can save websites if you want to read them anytime later, if they are not important enough to be a bookmark.
• History: well, your browser history.

Toolbar (bottom):
• Click (also magnifier icon): you can enter a search term (see below) or a url. By pressing \"enter\" or the magnifier icon, the website will load.
• Long click: will close the entire app (can be disabled in settings).
• Swipe: to the left to open your bookmarks and to the right to open your readLater list.
• History: opens a list of the last visited websites.

Menu:
• Save website: you can save the website to your bookmark or readLater list or save a screenshot of the whole website.
• Share website: you can share the screenshot of a website, share the link as text or copy the link to the clipboard.
• Search on site: search for text on any website.
• Open downloads: opens the system download manager.
• Settings: In the settings you can configure the behavior of the app, some privacy and security settings.

Search:
You can set your preferred search engine and the language for Wikipedia in the settings. You can search direct on different sites by typing the following before your search term (with the space):

• Duckduckgo: \".d \"
• Flickr (creative common license): \".f \"
• Github: \".g \"
• Google: \".G \"
• MetaGer: \".m \"
• Startpage: \".s \"
• Wikipedia: \".w \" //String arrays Small (70%) Normal (100%) Big (130%) 70 100 130 Duckduckgo Google (if you REALLY want it …) MetaGer Startpage https://duckduckgo.com/?q= https://www.google.com/search?&q= https://metager.de/meta/meta.ger3?focus=web&eingabe= https://startpage.com/do/search?query= English German en de
